items.title: Enable Full Panel
items.subtitle: This enables a full panel which is customizable but heavier on resources.

gsetting.title: Allow Audio Volume Above 100%
gsetting.subtitle:
This allows you to go above 100% volume in the top bar.
WARNING: this may have an impact on audio quality, and potentially could damage your audio hardware.

gsetting.title: Show Battery Percentage
gsetting.subtitle: This shows the battery percentage in the top bar. This is only useful if you have a laptop.
